name: Telegram Forwared Bot
description: Telegram bot to forware messages automatically

FROM_CHANNEL_ID.description: The channel id you when to forward the messages from (Only id, no -100 before).

TO_CHANNEL_ID.description: The channel id you whan to forward the messages to (Only id, no -100 before).

PHONE_NUMBER.description: The phone number of the account you want to login with.
